title: The Future of Identity (Keystone) in OpenStack
description:
Since the Essex release, the OpenStack Identity Project (Keystone) has
seen significant numbers of improvements. Some of these improvement
include the addition of the V3 API, PKI Tokens, Trusts, Federated
Identity, Non-Persistent Tokens, etc.

This talk will discuss the most recent developments for Keystone and
what is being planned for Identity during Liberty and beyond.
